Mr. Carl Menzer
-2
February 10, 1961
of the hard realities of life * The Center had the money and were willing to move
in and pick up the slack; we weren't in a position to take advantage of the
opportunity * However, the fact that the Center is going to do this sort of nuts
and bolts function in no way precludes the NAEB committees from continuing
their role of providing planning for and stimulation of new developments in
engineering phases of educational broadcasting.
Cordially yours.
W. G. Harley
President
WGHijph
